lead_paragraph: Patrick Kane, an 18-year-old forward who was the first pick over all in last month’s N.H.L. entry draft, has signed a three-year contract with the Chicago Blackhawks, the team announced yesterday. The 5-foot-10, 160-pound Kane led the Ontario Hockey League in scoring last season with 62 goals and 83 assists with the London Knights.
